1.0.4.en: Added test image. Fixed unhandledRejection errors. Added API check. Improved app logs. Removed INVALID_OUTER_ID log.

1.1.0.en: Added cloud queueing and rate limiting.

1.1.1.en: Added clickable registration link. Added log filters. Fixed flowtoken_already_exists. Fixed ENOENT: no such file or directory.

1.1.2.en: Fix not able to add faces. Add warning that each Homey needs own API key.

1.1.3.en: Fix not able to add faces. Add warning that each Homey needs own API key.

1.1.4.en: New settings and face set scheme. Minor fixes.

1.1.5.en: Stability improvements. Added toggle API Secret view in app settings. Fix threshold settings.

1.1.6.en: Fix not able to send to Telegram on NO_MATCH. Fix app settings pop-up messages.

1.1.7.en: Fix INVALID_OUTER_ID when no face added. Fix THRESHOLD error after clean install.

1.2.0.en: Added cropped face image tag in trigger card. Small fixes.

1.2.1.en: Added cropped face image tag in trigger card. Small fixes.
